ygData.subject: Re: Hello Again
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/26/99 12:21:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time, elijah@nemesysmusic.com writes: I don t understand what the point of making it bard/rogue
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/26/99 12:21:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
elijah@... writes:

<< >I don't understand what the point of making it bard/rogue only
>is if anyone can use it for the illusion effect.

Exactly, I have to wonder this too, pretty weird if you ask me. >>

Well i don't know if this happens with all races/classes . but when i
actually equip the mask and use it , things like trolls go from scowl , to
dubious when i con them. I don't know if this happens with non bards/rogues
using the effect

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 38 bard of Tunare
